titles.title: To designate the Washington Dulles International Airport in Virginia as the "Donald J. Trump International Airport".
To designate the Washington Dulles International Airport in Virginia as the "Donald J. Trump International Airport".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: This bill designates Washington Dulles International Airport in Virginia as the Donald J. Trump International Airport.
